common.rulesContent1: When you want to smoke a cigarette, you have two choices.
common.rulesContent2: Either you smoke it and you feel like the piece of shit you are, or you save your money and your lungs.
common.rulesContent3: In either case, the choice must be recorded here.
common.rulesContent4: It's impossible to touch a cigarette for the next 30 minutes after making that choice.
common.congratsContent1: I have to say, you're smarter than I thought.
common.booContent1: You're such an idiot, I hope you'll be proud of your bad breath.
common.booContent2: The last one you smoked was {{last}} ago, all that effort for nothing‚Ä¶
